author: cnbc.com
title: Wolters Kluwer to Lead Webinar on Emerging IPO Trends
text:
NEW YORK, March 19, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Wolters Kluwer Legal & Regulatory U.S. today announced that registration is open for its securities law webinar on Initial Public Offering (IPO) trends. The IPO Trends webinar will be held Wednesday, March 21, 2 PM – 2:30 PM ET.
John Atwood, associate managing analyst within Wolters Kluwer's securities unit, will lead the Q&A session with featured speaker John B. Meade, partner at Davis Polk & Wardwell. Meade will review and assess the driving factors behind the IPO rebound in 2017, and look ahead at what factors will likely influence 2018's IPO market performance. With recent market statistics as a backdrop, the webinar will provide investors and legal professionals in this practice area with insights into the challenges and opportunities in today's deal-making environment.
"Coming off a solid 2017, the IPO market posted its best January numbers ever, but lost some momentum in February in the face of broader market volatility," said Atwood. "Wolters Kluwer is pleased to join with Davis Polk & Wardwell partner John Meade, an adviser on IPOs by Hilton Worldwide, Manchester United and others, to discuss current IPO market dynamics."
As a partner in Davis Polk & Wardwell's Corporate Department, Meade primarily represents issuer and underwriter clients in public and private securities offerings, and also advises on general corporate matters, including strategic transactions, corporate governance and SEC reporting and compliance matters, for U.S. and non-U.S. corporations.
To register for the webinar, click the link below:
IPO Trends Webinar
Wednesday, March 21, 2 PM – 2:30 PM ET
Wolters Kluwer is a leading provider of content for IPO professionals and prospective IPO issuers. Wolters Kluwer's suite of IPO Vital Signs is a unique system that provides answers to critical questions facing IPO professionals and executives of pre-IPO companies. To learn more, visit: https://lrus.wolterskluwer.com/media/2386/ipo-vital-signs-brochure.pdf .
About Wolters Kluwer Legal & Regulatory U.S.
Wolters Kluwer Legal & Regulatory U.S. is a part of Wolters Kluwer N.V. (AEX: WKL), a global leader in information services and solutions for professionals in the health, tax and accounting, risk and compliance, finance and legal sectors. We help our customers make critical decisions every day by providing expert solutions that combine deep domain knowledge with specialized technology and services.
Wolters Kluwer reported 2017 annual revenues of €4.4 billion. The group serves customers in over 180 countries, maintains operations in over 40 countries, and employs approximately 19,000 people worldwide. The company is headquartered in Alphen aan den Rijn, the Netherlands.
For more information about Wolters Kluwer Legal & Regulatory U.S., visit www.WoltersKluwerLR.com , follow us on Facebook , Twitter and LinkedIn .
